text: Vspomnite, chto skazal vam Musa, kogda vy poklonilis' tel'tsu: "O narod moy! Vy sami sebe prichinili zlo, vzyav sebe bogom tel'tsa. Obratites' k vashemu Tvortsu s glubokim raskayaniyem i osudite svoi zlyye bezrassudnyye dushi, i uniz'te ikh, chtoby oni vozrodilis' i prevratilis' v chistyye dushi". I Allakh pomog vam v etom, i eto bylo luchshe dlya vas pered vashim Tvortsom. Allakh prinyal vashe raskayaniye i prostil vas: On miloserden k obrashchayushchimsya k Nemu s raskayaniyem
